Description: Mould-made pottery lamp; applied vertical band-handle(now lost) at the rear; rounded walls; raised points on the shoulder; lug on the left side; shallow channel connects the sunken discus and the splayed nozzle; monogram on the base; red slip.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (714)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
